mapper.insert: insert into cameraData (rasPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, imageUrl, isProcess, create_time, update_time ) values (#{rasPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: update cameraData set rasPiID = #{rasPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sensorID = #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, collectTime = #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, imageUrl = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isProcess = #{isProcess,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, rasPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, imageUrl, isProcess, create_time, update_time from cameraData where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, rasPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, imageUrl, isProcess, create_time, update_time from cameraData
